title: Rudeness

replies.body: How fast can you click legitimately?
replies.body_tagged: How fast can you click legitimately?

replies.body: ye you dont hack, you're good at pvp and get some sketchy hits and i used to hacksuate you b4 when i was shit at pvp
replies.body_tagged: ye you dont hack, you're good at pvp and get some sketchy hits and i used to hacksuate you b4 when i was shit at pvp

replies.body: I can click about 13cps
replies.body_tagged: I can click about 13cps

replies.body:
Some of the blocks you place seem a little faster than 13cps, that seems kinda sketchy, but nothing that is concrete evidence.
You also have some really weird headsnaps - too frequent to be luck, but those just look like good aim as you seem like a good pvper.

When I was mod, I would have watched you a fair bit as sometimes you look a bit sketchy, but based off that evidence, I wouldn't have banned you and I'm curious to see how that evidence is defended.

replies.body:
{tag=477c4aa7b68d442186fd8523e5033962}

If you have any concerns about your appeal, please comment on it and it will alert the Staff Member who issued your punishment. Instead of creating a thread about it, please comment with evidence of you not cheating on there rather than here. 
Edit: You can also contact me on skype: live:rob_junior_2000
{tag=7fd3b7f737e44c55a214878986207576},
There's no need to snap like that. I'm aware that you believe he does not hack, but I highly suggest you discuss your issue with the ban on the community slack, or on skype if you have him.

replies.body:
*That video you gave as evidence is not EVIDENCE BEYOND REASONABLE DOUBT that he is cheating. 
*If this video proves someone is hacking, then at least 10 members of our competitive community should be instantly banned too.... There are people who do far more than that and are regarded as "legit"
*He doesn't have to prove to you that he isn't cheating, you have to prove that he is cheating and if that's the only video given as evidence, then you haven't proven it.
*An appeal shouldn't go like this: "We voted and think you're cheating" It should go like this: "If you look at time *Insert time here* you get a hit from 5 blocks away with no lag, indicating reach with no chance of hit delay" or "Within 3 minutes, you perform 20 near impossible headsnaps - too many to be luck", based on these several extremely sketchy moments within a 10 minutes video, we are very sure you are cheating.
*Even I can do that backwards bullshit bridge on a good day and I'm clicking at 8cps.

This topic is about talking about this ban, so this is on topic
